channel.title: Malazan Book of the Fallen on Atharva Shah
channel.description: Recent content in Malazan Book of the Fallen on Atharva Shah

item.title: Book Review: Deadhouse Gates by Steven Erikson
item.description: Rising rebellions, ancient secrets, and an Empire on the brink of war. The second book in the Malazan Book of the Fallen series is a thrilling and tragic tale of war and its consequences.

item.title: Book Review: Gardens of the Moon by Steven Erikson
item.description: The Gardens of the Moon, the first volume of the Malazan Book of the Fallen, is a sprawling epic fantasy of monumental proportions.

item.title: Prelude to Malazan Book of the Fallen Challenge
item.description: Opening thoughts and ponderings before taking on the humungous Malazan Book of the Fallen series. Setting expectations and challenges before embarking on a fantasy adventure.
